content: A friend of mine wants to know where it is explicitly written out that the Stasheff pentagon commutes in any category with finite cartesian products. Surely this appears in the literature or in a textbook somewhere. Can anyone give a pointer? (I'm not looking for someone to give the proof; just a citation, please.)
Well, there is a half-sentence summary of the proof in CWM (VII.1)
Thanks, Reid. I'll touch base with my friend to see if this is sufficient for him. (My spidey sense is that he wants to locate something less breezy and more pedagogical.)
